Name:
Splendor
Rosebay
Builder: Kingston Shipbuilding Co., Kingston, Ontario, Canada
Fate:
Transferred to the Royal Navy
Returned to US Navy custody 20 March 1946
Propulsion: two 3-drum express boilers, 2,750ihp vertical triple expansion Canadian Vickers engine, one shaft.
Armament:
2 × 3"/50 dual purpose gun mounts
2 × 20 mm gun mounts
1 × Hedgehog
4 × depth charge guns
2 × depth charge chutes
